forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight deepens over Downtown San Francisco, the city rests beneath a canvas of mostly cloudy skies, where the warmth of the day gracefully yields to the coolness of night. A gentle breeze stirs, carrying the unmistakable saltiness of the bay and the crisp hint of dusk. The temperature dips to a comfortable 57 degrees, a subtle reminder of the marine layer that often envelops the Golden Gate, just visible through the light veil of cloud. The gusting winds, clocking in at around 21 mph from the west, lend an invigorating feel to the evening, perfect for those adventurous enough to stroll along the waterfront or seek solace in a cozy café.

Despite the lingering clouds, the city remains a vibrant tapestry of life, inviting ambling walks through its hilly streets or a leisurely evening spent in pleasant conversation outdoors. A light jacket would be wise, not just for warmth, but to embrace the shifting temperatures that encapsulate the charm of San Francisco evenings. Seek out a quiet corner where the city’s spirit can be fully absorbed; after all, in this delightful city, even an ordinary evening holds the promise of extraordinary moments.
